page.title: 14SPORTS AND RECREATION
page.content: This rural area has many country trails including the Derwent Walk. Cyclists horseriders and joggers also use this disused railway line.The walk passes through the Derwent Park which offers many recreatianal amenities.This caravan park and camping site has a public park with swings and roundabouts, bowling green, tennis courts and crazy golf course. Its riverside positian makes the large picnic area very pleasant.There are many wooded areas which have been developed by the Local Authority employing guides for nature rambles. The Gibside Estate with historic chapel, ruins and landscaped grounds provides beautiful surroundings for leisurely strolls.Whickham has an eighteen hole golf course and extensive club house.Most schools in
